name: Priya Sharma
persona: Priya Sharma is a 20-year-old Computer Science major who takes her studies seriously and consistently aims to improve her academic performance. With a CGPA of 3.13, Priya demonstrates solid motivation and perseverance, even when coursework becomes challenging. She manages her time effectively and is determined to reach her goals, though she sometimes experiences moderate test anxiety. Priya is actively involved in coding clubs and seeks out opportunities to apply her knowledge beyond the classroom.
